price: 80. Les magiciens venus, Moïse leur dit : « Jetez ce que vous voulez jeter. »
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
